Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Macroscopic \Mac`ro*scop"ic\, Macroscopical \Mac`ro*scop"ic*al\, a. [Macro- + Gr. ? to view.] Visible to the unassisted eye; -- as opposed to {microscopic}. -- {Mac`ro*scop"ic*al*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]
macroscopic adj : large enough to be visible to the naked eye [syn: {macroscopical}, {large}] [ant: {microscopic}]
